sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndbmntrng ( DATA_SOURC_NM , server_nm , dbms_knd , ceck_sql , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #dataSourcNm# , #serverNm# , #dbmsKnd# , #ceckSql# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndbmntrng SET data_sourc_nm = #dataSourcNm# , server_nm = #serverNm# , dbms_knd = #dbmsKnd# , ceck_sql = #ceckSql# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE data_sourc_nm = #dataSourcNm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT data_sourc_nm , server_nm , dbms_knd , ceck_sql , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndbmntrng WHERE data_sourc_nm = #dataSourcNm#

SELECT data_sourc_nm , server_nm , dbms_knd , ceck_sql , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndbmntrng WHERE 1=1
data_sourc_nm = #searchKeyword#
server_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY data_sourc_nm DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndbmntrng WHERE 1=1
data_sourc_nm = #searchKeyword#
server_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
